speaks asks why are super PACs allowed
and if they're legal why does every
candidate have one yet act like they are
the plague super PACs originated with
Supreme Court decision in 2010 you've
probably heard of called citizens united
and while citizens united do not
directly create super PACs the courts
reasoning on what are called independent
expenditures pave the way what we now
call super PACs and a super PAC is
basically a political committee is
primary purpose is to influence
elections and which can take unlimited
amounts of money outside of federal
contribution limits from rich people
from unions and from corporations pooled
all together and spend it to advocate
for a candidate as long as they are
independent and not coordinating with
the candidate our destiny pack is
responsible for the content of this

is every candidate treat them like they
are the plague with the exception of one

our future ring none of these super PACs
